sentence: A 2nd amendment lobbyist testifying in favor of the bill described the ability for jurisdictions to share information about licensees as a backdoor registry, which we oppose.? The silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling.? That's what U.S. Rep. Liz Cheney said about Republican Marjorie Taylor Greene decision to address a white nationalist conference on Friday.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: David Perdue targets Gov. Brian Kemp's prized Rivian deal
